fullText: Andy Karl gives a tour-de-force performance as Phil Connors, the cynical TV weatherman trapped in a time loop, bringing both comic timing and surprising emotional depth to this inventive musical adaptation.
dtliExcerpt: Andy Karl gives a tour-de-force performance as Phil Connors, the cynical TV weatherman trapped in a time loop, bringing both comic timing and surprising emotional depth to this inventive musical adaptation.
bwwExcerpt: Under Matthew Warchus's helming, Phil's adventures in Punxsutawney are like Alice's adventures in Wonderland - fantastical and fun. Rob Howell's set designs and Paul Kieve's illusions rely on amusing optical illusions like miniature car chases and teeny-tiny houses that curl around the proscenium. These funny folk even build a sort-of functional truck on stage.
